Title: Garifuna in Peril
Writer: Ali Allie (story), Ali Allie, Ruben Reyes (story), Ruben Reyes
Actors: Ruben Reyes, Julian Castillo, Gloria Garnett, Yessica Alvarez
Plot: A Garifuna language teacher fights to keep his endangered language alive in the face of personal betrayal and tourism's encroachment.
